item.title: CARDS' market capitalization briefly surpassed $120 million, with a 24-hour price increase of 24.2%.
item.description: On September 6th, according to GMGN market data, the entity card trading platform Collector Crypt within the Solana ecosystem briefly exceeded a market capitalization of $1.2 billion. Currently, it is reported at $1.04 billion, with a token price of $0.2559 and a 24-hour percentage increase of 24.2%. The fully diluted value (FDV) is currently reported at $5.14 billion, and the 24-hour total network trading volume is $39.98 million.

item.title: Yesterday's US Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net outflow of $446 million
item.description: On September 6th, as monitored by Farside Investors, yesterday in the US, the Ethereum spot ETF witnessed a net outflow of $446 million. This included:- BlackRock ETHA: -$3.099 billion- Fidelity FETH: -$37.8 million- 21Shares TETH: -$14.7 million- Grayscale ETHE: -$51.8 million- Grayscale Ethereum Trust: -$32.6 million

item.title: Yesterday, the US Bitcoin Spot ETF experienced a net outflow of $160 million.
item.description: On September 6th, as monitored by Farside Investors, yesterday in the US, the Bitcoin spot ETF witnessed a net outflow of $160 million. The breakdown is as follows:BlackRock IBIT: -$63.2 millionBitwise BITB: -$49.6 millionGrayscale GBTC: -$47.3 million

item.title: Arkham: 45,000 BTC Found Untouched by German Government, Potentially Still Controlled by Movie2K Operator
item.description: On September 6th, Arkham announced via social media that the organization has located 5 billion dollars' worth of Bitcoin that the German government failed to confiscate.Previously, in early 2024, the German police seized 49,858 bitcoins from the operator of the video piracy website Movie2K. In July 2024, these bitcoins were sold at an average price of $57,900, resulting in a profit of $2.89 billion.However, Arkham's research uncovered another Bitcoin cluster associated with Movie2K's early operations. This cluster consists of approximately 45,000 bitcoins (worth $4.99 billion) and has not been moved since 2019. These bitcoins are stored in more than 100 Bitcoin wallets and are likely still under the control of the Movie2K operator. The scale of this batch is almost equivalent to the seized bitcoins.The German government's statement did not mention this additional batch of bitcoins and did not incorporate them into the initial "emergency sale" plan.

item.title: WLFI Partners with RaveDAO for First On-Chain Payments Event in Korea, Launches World's First USD1 Offline Payment System
item.description: Lookonchain News, WLFI (World Liberty Financial) is teaming up with RaveDAO, the world's largest Web3 rave community, for its first-ever offline event during Korea Blockchain Week on September 24, 2025. This will be the first time USD1 can be used for on-site payments, covering both tickets and purchases.

item.title: A whale address has deposited 2074 ETH into Kraken for liquidation sell-off.
item.description: On September 6th, as per the monitoring of Onchain lens, a whale address transferred the final 2,074 ETH (valued at $9.07 million) into Kraken, achieving a profit of $6.07 million. The whale address had amassed 3,289 ETH with a price of $6.43 million between September 4, 2021, and December 9, 2024.

item.title: 「Iron Hands Air Force」 Whale Continues to Short, with Unrealized Losses Exceeding Ten Million Dollars, PUMP Single Coin Loss Nearly 13 Million Dollars
item.description: On September 6th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, the "IronHead Air Force" whale whose address begins with 0x880ac has been continuously shorting multiple currencies over the past month. The total unrealized loss in the past week has reached approximately $10.41 million. Its largest short position is in PUMP, with a short price of $0.0033, and the current unrealized loss for this single coin is about $12.97 million. This address also holds about $30.04 million in short positions of SOL, about $12.58 million in short positions of BTC, as well as short positions in LINK, BCH, LTC, and other mainstream coins.

item.title: The largest ENA holding address on Hyperliquid has a long position of over 5x, currently showing a unrealized gain of $3.1 million.
item.description: On September 6th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), due to the Ethena Foundation's buyback plan, ENA witnessed a price increase of more than 13% in the past 24 hours. The largest holder on Hyperliquid ENA, with the address 0x6b7...c5e9c, has a long position that is more than 5 times and has a realized profit of $3.107 million.This address has been holding a long position in ENA since July 29th. Currently, it holds 49.18 million tokens (approximately $36.63 million) with an average entry price of $0.6804.BlockBeats previously reported that Ethena announced early this morning a $530 million additional "StablecoinX" PIPE transaction, and the foundation launched a new $310 million open market buyback plan.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Stocks Showing Mixed Performance, BNC Up 20%, Trump-Related ALTS, ABTC Up Around 15%
item.description: On September 6th, based on market data, the U.S. stock market closed on Friday. The Dow dropped by 0.48%, the S&P 500 decreased by 0.32%, and the Nasdaq fell by 0.03%. item.title: The SEC Delays Decision on the Grayscale DOT Spot ETF
item.description: On September 6th, according to official channels, the SEC has postponed its decision regarding the Grayscale Polkadot (DOT) spot ETF application.
